casebody.data:
DELAFIELD, MARSH, PORTER & HOPE, Appellants, v. George L. LONG, Joseph W. Ferris and Henry Leifert, as Trustees under a Declaration of Trust Dated as of July 1, 1938, Appellees. Nos. 46-51. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 30, 1939. Delafield, Marsh, Porter & Hope, of New York City (John Ross Delafield and Eugene Blanc, Jr., both of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Charles H. Kriger, of Brooklyn, N. Y., for appellees.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Orders affirmed.
